description: ff. 179. 183 x 139; 138 x 97 mm. 18 lin. Ramaḍān 866, ḥasan ibn ʻAlī ibn Ibrāhīm ibn Maḥmūd al-Mardāwī al-Saʻdī. Commentary on the work of Muwaffaq al-Dīn ibn Qudāmah: Brockelmann, GAL, S I, 688 (no. l, commentary e). Incip.: ... الحمدلله الذى خلق الانسان ... اما بعد فهذا مختصر ىشتمل على شرح
author: Baʻlī, Muḥammad ibn Abī al-Fatḥ, 1247 or 8-1309 or 10.
title: al-Muṭliʻ fī ḥall alfāẓ al-Muqniʻ.
creator: Baʻlī, Muḥammad ibn Abī al-Fatḥ, 1247 or 8-1309 or 10.
subject: Ibn Qudāmah, Muwaffaq al-Dīn ʻAbd Allāh ibn Aḥmad, 1147-1223—Muqniʻ.
member of collections: Princeton Digital Library of Islamic Manuscripts
